Define the constraints on 

* energy
* protein, fat, carbs, sugar, alcohol 
* GHGE (greenhouse gas equivalent)

```{r}
#| label: load-contraints
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

constraints <- data.frame(
  constraint = c('lower', 'upper'), 
  energy = c(9000, 10000), 
  protein = c(55, 111.5), 
  fat = c(61.8, 98.8), 
  carbs = c(250, 334.6), 
  sugar = c(0, 54.8), 
  alcohol = c(0, 10),
  ghge = c(0, 4.7)
)
constraints
```
